subject: Re: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I get that too, sometimes i turn it on and they are in mid 
conversation.  Than a couple minutes later they say "Steve's here" or 
something like that.  I wonder if they have an "On AiR" light that 
comes on when we turn the box on.  Almost like a radio station on 
their side, saying "Well, we have a caller on the line----It's Steve 
from Keyport and he wants to ask some stupid questions".  Silly 
scenario, but that's how it seems.  To answer your question, i had 
asked if they had any messages for me before that answer came out.  
But there was too much time that lapsed between it, so i wasn't sure 
if i could use that as an answer to my question.

-Steve H.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "itcdeadpeople" <ITCdeadpeople@...> 
wrote:
>
> Hi Steve.  Was this response in relation to something you'd said?  
I absolutely can hear it as 
> you are, but I hear it equally well as, "Howard said."  I notice 
this a lot in my own 
> recordings, being able to hear a couple very similar sounding 
phrases in the same 
> example.  
> 
> In regard your post about them maybe being earthbound ... I don't 
know how we could 
> determine that based only on what is said.  I suppose you could do 
a followup session to 
> ask who it is, where they are, and if he was talking to you.  I 
know sometimes in my 
> sessions, I'm essentially 'eavesdropping' on an other side 
conversation, and what is being 
> said doesn't really apply to me.  Sort of like picking up on a 
party phone line.  
> 
> Margaret
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com wrote:
